sub_title: Project Manager EU Deforestation Regulation bij Ministerie van Landbouw, Natuur en Voedselkwaliteit
summary:
Experienced and result driven:
- Former EU diplomat with an extensive knowledge of & network within the EU institutes
- Program / Project Manager / Policy Advisor in the governmental agrifood and nature domain, serving public affairs, nature restoration, deforestation, safety of food, plants and animals & animal welfare, innovation and trade.
I speak English, German, French, Spanish and Russian.

company.name: Ministerie van Landbouw, Natuur en Voedselkwaliteit

profile_positions.company: Ministerie van Landbouw, Natuur en Voedselkwaliteit
profile_positions.description: Managing the implementation of the EU Deforestation Products Regulation in the Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager EU Deforestation Regulation

profile_positions.company: Ministerie van Landbouw, Natuur en Voedselkwaliteit
profile_positions.description: Managing the NL contribution to the EU negotiations on the proposed Nature Restoration Regulation.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager EU Nature Restoration Regulation

profile_positions.company: Ministerie van Landbouw, Natuur en Voedselkwaliteit
profile_positions.description: Advising NL minister of agriculture, nature and food quality and NL minister for nature and nitrogen on the EU strategy that addresses the risks and opportunities of the EU Green Deal for achieving the policy goals of the current NL government.
profile_positions.title: Strategic EU Advisor

profile_positions.company: Ministerie van Landbouw, Natuur en Voedselkwaliteit
profile_positions.description: Advising NL minister of agriculture, nature and food quality and NL minister for nature and nitrogen on the EU Farm to Fork policy.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager EU Farm to Fork

profile_positions.company: Ministerie van Landbouw, Natuur en Voedselkwaliteit
profile_positions.description: Managing the development of policy advice for the steering board of the NL Strategic Plan on how NL will govern the national implementation of this plan. This NSP plan describes how NL farming will comply with the goals and rules of the EU Common Agricultural Policy Regulation which should contribute to the goals of the EU Green Deal.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager NSP Governance

profile_positions.company: Ministerie van Landbouw, Natuur en Voedselkwaliteit
profile_positions.description: Managing the implementation in NL of (EU) 2017/1185 aiming at improving market transparency in the food chain.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager EU Market Transparency Regulation

profile_positions.company: Ministerie van Landbouw, Natuur en Voedselkwaliteit
profile_positions.description: Managing the implementation of the EU Animal Health Regulation in the Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager EU Animal Health Regulation

profile_positions.company: Ministerie van Landbouw, Natuur en Voedselkwaliteit
profile_positions.description: Managing the implementation in NL of the EU Official Controls Regulation on Plants, Animals and Food.
profile_positions.title: Program Manager EU Official Controls Regulation

profile_positions.location: Permanent Representation of NL to the EU in Brussels
profile_positions.company: Ministerie van Landbouw, Natuur en Voedselkwaliteit
profile_positions.title: Diplomat - Counselor for Veterinary and Phytosanitary Affairs & Sustainable Food Production

profile_positions.company: Ministerie van Landbouw, Natuur en Voedselkwaliteit
profile_positions.description:
Providing the framework for veterinary export to Asia, North America, Australia, New Zealand and South Africa, while representing NL in negotiations on veterinary export certification.

Author of the 2011 Netherlands' veterinary export strategy.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Policy Advisor on Veterinary Trade

profile_positions.company: Ministerie van Landbouw, Natuur en Voedselkwaliteit
profile_positions.description: Contributing to several horizontal animal welfare & health issues.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Policy Advisor on Animal Health and Welfare

profile_positions.company: Ministerie van Landbouw, Natuur en Voedselkwaliteit
profile_positions.description:
Shaping OECD, EU and Dutch legislation & practice for & of sustainable plant protection, while representing the Netherlands.

Minimising barriers for export of consumer crops to Russia, while representing/leading NL in negotiations with Russian authorities in Berlin, Moscow, Paris and The Hague on pesticide residue levels on fruits and vegetables.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Policy Advisor on Plant Protection

profile_positions.company: Ministerie van Landbouw, Natuur en Voedselkwaliteit
profile_positions.description:
Coordinating NL agricultural positions for EU Council meetings.
Preparing incoming and outgoing ministerial and other high level visits to and of foreign entities.
profile_positions.title: Policy Advisor on International Affairs

profile_positions.company: Ministerie van Landbouw, Natuur en Voedselkwaliteit
profile_positions.description: Leading the development of payment systems.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager
